attributes.action: Remove the law on owning pitbulls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that the government and police take a dim view at such innocent animals yes there has been bad press caused by a minority of pitbulls due to bad owners so i believe we shouldnt all have to suffer so i believe the government and police should re-concider the law even if their is rules regarding ownership
